question: Based on the provided evidence, answer the following question: What position did Jurja Živković hold in 2028?. If the evidence is insufficient to answer the question, return 'INSUFFICIENT_INFORMATION'.

content.source_1: In the heart of Croatia, where the rolling hills of the Dinaric Alps meet the serene waters of the Adriatic Sea, lies the historic city of Sisak. It is here, in this ancient settlement, that the Roman Catholic Diocese of Sisak has its seat, and where Jurja Živković, a devoted servant of the Lord, has been entrusted with the sacred duty of guiding his flock as the diocesan bishop. As we delve into the life and ministry of Bishop Živković, it becomes evident that his appointment to this esteemed position is not merely a titular honor, but a testament to his unwavering commitment to the people of Sisak and his dedication to the pastoral care of his diocese. The first piece of evidence that supports this claim lies in the official documentation of the Catholic Church. According to the Annuario Pontificio, the official directory of the Holy See, Jurja Živković is listed as the Bishop of Sisak, a diocese that has been in existence since the 11th century. This listing is not merely a formality, but a recognition of his authority and responsibility as the spiritual leader of the diocese. Furthermore, Bishop Živković's involvement in the daily life of the diocese is a clear indication of his diocesan bishop status. He is frequently seen celebrating Mass at the Cathedral of the Exaltation of the Holy Cross, the mother church of the diocese, where he imparts his wisdom and guidance to the faithful. His presence is also felt in the various parishes and communities throughout the diocese, where he engages with the people, listens to their concerns, and provides spiritual direction. In addition, Bishop Živković's role in the Croatian Bishops' Conference, the national episcopal conference of the Catholic Church in Croatia, is another testament to his position as diocesan bishop. As a member of this esteemed body, he participates in the decision-making process, contributing to the development of policies and guidelines that shape the Church's response to the needs of the faithful in Croatia. The bishop's involvement in the local community is also noteworthy. He has been instrumental in promoting interfaith dialogue and cooperation, working closely with leaders of other Christian denominations and religious traditions to foster greater understanding and mutual respect. His efforts have helped to build bridges between communities, promoting peace and harmony in the region.
content.source_2: In the year 2036, the small coastal town of Saint-Agnant in Charente-Maritime, France, was bustling with activity. The once-quaint streets were now lined with sleek, eco-friendly buildings and humming with the quiet efficiency of advanced technology. Amidst this modern backdrop, a unique figure emerged as a leader in the community. Jurja Živković, a Roman Catholic bishop, had taken on the role of conseiller municipal de Saint-Agnant, bringing a sense of spiritual guidance to the town's governance. As the years leading up to 2036 had unfolded, the world had undergone a profound transformation. The effects of climate change had been mitigated, and sustainable energy sources had become the norm. Cities like Saint-Agnant had adapted, incorporating green spaces and innovative architecture to create thriving, eco-conscious communities. Jurja Živković, a man of strong faith and vision, had played a significant role in this transformation. As a bishop, he had worked tirelessly to promote interfaith dialogue and understanding, helping to bridge the gap between religious and secular leaders. His commitment to social justice and environmental stewardship had earned him the respect and admiration of the people of Saint-Agnant. In 2036, as the conseiller municipal, Živković brought his unique perspective to the town council. He worked closely with the mayor and other council members to develop initiatives that balanced economic growth with environmental responsibility. His influence helped to shape policies that prioritized education, healthcare, and social welfare, ensuring that the benefits of progress were shared equitably among all members of the community. As the years went by, Saint-Agnant flourished under Živković's guidance. The town became a model for sustainable development, attracting visitors and entrepreneurs from around the world. The bishop's leadership had created a beacon of hope, demonstrating that faith, compassion, and innovation could come together to build a brighter future. In 2036, as Jurja Živković looked out upon the vibrant, thriving town he had helped to shape, he knew that his work was far from over.
